item.title: Resizing Client
item.dc:creator: @pompio pompio
item.description:
@pompio wrote:

Basicly i am wanting to make it so you can resize client with out remove messing up. Obviously easy fix would be just changing ~450~ or whatever but i want it so it changes along with client. I wondered if anyone could help me with this?

[code] friendsMenu.drawMenuListText(friendsMenuHandle, i1, s + DataOperations.longToString(super.friendsListLongs[i1]) + “~950~@whi@Remove WWWWWWWWWW”);
}

    }
    if (anInt981 == 1) {
        for (int j1 = 0; j1 < super.ignoreListCount; j1++)
            friendsMenu.drawMenuListText(friendsMenuHandle, j1, "@yel@" + DataOperations.longToString(super.ignoreListLongs[j1]) + "~950~@whi@Remove         WWWWWWWWWW");

    }[/code]
